Institution: SSCF - SEMINOLE STATE COLLEGE OF FLORIDA
Course Description: THIS COURSE EXPLORES TOPICS RELEVANT IN TODAY’S ACCOUNTING DISCIPLINE. COURSE MATERIAL IS DELIVERED IN AN INDIVIDUAL SETTING AND OFTEN WILL INCLUDE A RESEARCH PAPER/PROJECT BASED ON A CURRENT ACCOUNTING TOPIC.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major:
•	EXPRESS OPINIONS AND ENGAGE IN DISCUSSIONS ABOUT A VARIETY OF TOPICS.
•	DEMONSTRATE AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE TOPICS DISCUSSED.
•	MASTER THE SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES ESTABLISHED FOR THE TOPIC.
